head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, WILLIAM L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, WILLIAM L.

block.p: SIMON-William L. (Bill), 80. Of Sarasota, FL, on August 20, 2000. Retired Senior Music Editor, Reader's Digest Books and Recorded Music; Former Associate Editor of The Billboard and Manager-Editor of Book-of-the-Month Club's Popular Record Club; jazz record producer and writer; songwriter; saxophonist. Survived by wife, Barbara, daughters Toni and Beryl, grandsons James and Michael, sisters, Dorothy Engel and Helen Yasgur. Donations can be made to Senior Musicians Assoc, 322 West 48th Street, NY, NY 10036 or Juvenile Diabetes Foundation.
